The elections saw nearly 50% voter turnout across Mumbai and 28 other municipal corporations in Maharashtra.

description: Veeramangudi, in Papanasam taluk of Tamil Nadu’s Thanjavur district, is known for its production of the soft and crumbly atchu vellam (jaggery set into cubical wooden moulds). Factories in and around the village produce approximately 245 tonnes of jaggery (7,000 bags of 35 kg each) annually. Of late though, these factories have started closing down due to an attack of yellow leaf disease in the sugarcane crop.

CBSE orders schools to disclose teacher strength: Why India’s ‘comfortable’ PTR tells only half story
description: CBSE has told its affiliated schools to stop treating staffing as a backroom file. By February 15, 2026, they must put teacher details and qualifications on their websites under Mandatory Public Disclosure, with the board warning that gaps or errors can invite action under affiliation rules. The timing is telling: India’s PTR can look comfortable in national averages, but state-wise spikes and single-teacher schools reveal how unevenly teachers are actually spread.

title: Singer Saindhavi on music, films and life | Margazhi | GV Prakash
description:
Popular Chennai-based singer, Saindhavi, has just seen two radically different musical stages: Carnatic music performances at Chennai’s sabhas during the Margazhi season, and performing at actor Vijay’s ‘Jana Nayagan’ musical event in Malaysia.

In an interview with ‘The Hindu’ for the ‘This Changed My Life’ video podcast, this popular singer talks about adapting to the needs of modern audiences. She also talks about her relationship with popular music composer GV Prakash after their official divorce in 2025, and how they co-parent their young daughter, Anvi.

Reporter: Srinivasa Ramanujam

title: The Boomerang risk: How Trump's 'help' could save Khamenei's regime in Iran
description: History suggests outside military pressure often ends up rescuing Tehran. Even the prospect of US or Israeli strikes can redirect public anger away from regime misrule and toward sheer national survival, splinter protest alliances, and give authorities cover for a far harsher crackdown. At a time when Iran’s leadership is fighting to reassert control, foreign force could deliver its most potent weapon: nationalism.

title: Bulldozers clearing bodies from streets: Iranians in India reveal horror of deadly protests
description: Reports from Iran paint a grim picture: overflowing hospitals, streets cleared by earthmovers, and families charged for their children's bullets. Iranians abroad are raising their voices, seeking support and highlighting the dire situation back home.

A recent strategy clash highlighted differing priorities, with Wang pushing for cutting-edge AI over immediate product integration.

title: LeBron James’ two-word message honors Kyle Lowry’s Toronto homecoming

title: IShowSpeed net worth timeline: How Darren Watkins Jr built his fortune
description: Darren Watkins Jr, known as IShowSpeed, transformed from a young gamer into a global streaming sensation. His earnings grew steadily from YouTube ads to music, tours, and brand deals.  Starting with minimal income, his net worth surged significantly between 2020 and 2026, reaching an estimated $35-40 million.  He maintains a private personal life.

title: Patrick Mahomes stays low-key as Brittany Mahomes marks milestone amid recovery doubts
description: Patrick Mahomes is staying largely out of the public eye as he continues his rehab following a season-ending knee injury. While his recovery timeline remains uncertain, his wife Brittany recently shared a family milestone, drawing attention to the quieter phase of Mahomes’ career as he balances healing, home life, and preparation for his return.
